title.narrative: OUTPUT 4 Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) EMERGENCY

description.narrative: Aden Field Office Programme Implementation to achieve strengthened political commitment to legislate, plan, budget to scale up access to safe drinking water, adequate sanitation and improved hygiene practices., which contributes to Sanitation, Wash And Emergencies, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Adolescent girls and boys, mothers and fathers, and community leaders in 106 districts adopt 11 key life-saving, care and protective behaviours for children and women
